name: plutonium-item-icon-updater
title: Plutonium Item Icon Updater
description: Automatically updates missing icons on actor-owned items (inventory, features, spells, etc.). This is particularly useful in conjunction with the VTTA D&D Beyond Integration module for importing full characters. Item names are searched for in optional user-specified dictionary, a built-in dictionary, all game items, and all item compendiums. This is an update for Plutonium default icons.
author: DFreds
